#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
int t,r,c;
long long sum;
scanf("%d", &t);
while(t--)
{
    sum=0;
    scanf("%d%d",&r,&c);
    if(c>2&&c%2!=0)
    sum+=(c-3)/2+2;
    else if(c==2)
    sum+=2;
    else if((c>2&&c%2==0))
    sum+=(c-3)/2+3;
    else
    sum+=1;

    if(r&1)
    {
        sum+=(r-1)/2;
    }
    else
    sum+=(r)/2;

    if(r==0||c==0)
    sum=0;

    cout<<sum<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
